name: Iron Man

abilities.name: Repulsor Rays
abilities.details: Fires energy beams from his palms. Consumes suit energy.

abilities.name: Flight
abilities.details: Engages suit thrusters for sustained flight. Consumes suit energy.

abilities.name: Micro-Missiles
abilities.details: Launches a volley of small guided missiles.

abilities.name: Boost Dash
abilities.details: Performs a quick directional boost using thrusters.

ultimate.name: Unibeam
ultimate.effect: Fires a powerful, sustained energy beam from his chest reactor.
ultimate.details: The suit's most powerful directed energy weapon. Locks movement during cast.

passives.name: Arc Reactor
passives.details: Manages suit energy which regenerates over time. Used for Flight and Repulsors.

teamups.effect: Micro-Missiles gain increased homing strength near specified allies.

lore: Genius billionaire inventor Tony Stark, wounded and captured, created a powered suit of armor to escape and survive. He continuously upgrades his Iron Man technology to fight evil and protect the world.
